description.english: Completely necessary adventure begins!
description.portuguese: A aventura completamente necessária começa!
description.brazilian: A aventura completamente necessária começa!
description.spanish: ¡La aventura completamente necesaria comienza!
description.japanese: 完全に必要な冒険が始まります！
description.schinese: 完全必要的冒险开始了！
description.german: Das absolut notwendige Abenteuer beginnt!
description.french: L'aventure tout à fait nécessaire commence !

displayName.japanese: あなたは私をだますことはできません
displayName.french: VOUS NE POUVEZ PAS ME TROMPER

description.english: Complete level 5-7 without activating trap lever
description.indonesian: Selesaikan level 5-7 tanpa mengaktifkan tuas jebakan
description.portuguese: Completa o nível 5-7 sem ativar a alavanca da armadilha
description.brazilian: Complete o nível 5-7 sem ativar a alavanca da armadilha
description.spanish: Completa el nivel 5-7 sin activar la palanca de la trampa
description.polish: Ukończ poziom 5-7 bez aktywowania dźwigni pułapki
description.japanese: トラップレバーを作動させずに 5-7 レベルをクリアしてください
description.schinese: 在不激活陷阱拉杆的情况下完成 5-7 关卡
description.koreana: 함정 레버를 작동시키지 않고 5-7 레벨을 완료하세요
description.german: Schließe Level 5-7 ab, ohne den Fallenhebel zu aktivieren
description.french: Terminez le niveau 5-7 sans activer le levier du piège
description.russian: Пройдите уровень 5-7, не активируя рычаг ловушки

description.english: So shiny!
description.german: So glänzend!
description.french: Tellement brillant !
description.spanish: ¡Tan brillante!
description.schinese: 如此闪耀！
description.japanese: とても輝いています！
description.portuguese: Tão brilhante!
description.brazilian: Tão brilhante!

description.english: I caught them all!
description.german: Ich habe sie alle gefangen!
description.french: Je les ai tous attrapés !
description.spanish: ¡Los atrapé a todos!
description.schinese: 我把它们都抓住了！
description.japanese: 私はそれらをすべて捕まえました！
description.portuguese: Apanhei-os todos!
description.brazilian: Eu peguei todos eles!

description.english: I told you it was a necessary adventure!
description.indonesian: Sudah kubilang ini petualangan yang diperlukan!
description.portuguese: Eu disse-te que era uma aventura necessária!
description.brazilian: Eu te disse que era uma aventura necessária!
description.spanish: ¡Te dije que era una aventura necesaria!
description.turkish: Size bunun gerekli bir macera olduğunu söylemiştim!
description.japanese: 私はそれが冒険が必要だと言いました！
description.schinese: 我告诉过你，这是一次必要的冒险！
description.german: Ich habe dir gesagt, es war ein notwendiges Abenteuer!
description.french: Je t'avais dit que c'était une aventure nécessaire !
description.russian: Я же говорил, что это необходимое приключение!

description.english: Complete the challenge pushing a rock.
description.portuguese: Completa o desafio a empurrar uma pedra.
description.brazilian: Complete o desafio empurrando uma pedra.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío empujando una roca.
description.japanese: 石を押してチャレンジを完了してください。
description.schinese: 通过推动石头完成挑战。
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung ab, indem du einen Stein schiebst.
description.french: Terminez le défi en poussant une pierre.

description.english: Complete the challenge by connecting a laser.
description.portuguese: Completa o desafio a ligar um laser.
description.brazilian: Complete o desafio conectando um laser.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío conectando un láser.
description.japanese: レーザーを接続してチャレンジを完了してください。
description.schinese: 通过连接激光完成挑战。
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung ab, indem du einen Laser verbindest.
description.french: Terminez le défi en connectant un laser.

description.english: Complete the challenge using a lever.
description.portuguese: Completa o desafio a usar uma alavanca.
description.brazilian: Complete o desafio usando uma alavanca.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío usando una palanca.
description.japanese: レバーを使用してチャレンジを完了してください。
description.schinese: 通过使用拉杆完成挑战。
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung ab, indem du einen Hebel benutzt.
description.french: Terminez le défi en utilisant un levier.

description.english: Complete the challenge using a reflector.
description.portuguese: Completa o desafio a usar um refletor.
description.brazilian: Complete o desafio usando um refletor.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío usando un reflector.
description.japanese: リフレクターを使用してチャレンジを完了してください。
description.schinese: 通过使用反射器完成挑战。
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung ab, indem du einen Reflektor benutzt.
description.french: Terminez le défi en utilisant un réflecteur.

description.english: Complete the challenge by connecting a yellow laser.
description.indonesian: Selesaikan tantangan dengan menghubungkan laser kuning.
description.portuguese: Completa o desafio a ligar um laser amarelo.
description.brazilian: Complete o desafio conectando um laser amarelo.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío conectando un láser amarillo.
description.turkish: Sarı bir lazer bağlayarak mücadeleyi tamamlayın.
description.japanese: 黄色いレーザーを接続してチャレンジを完了してください。
description.schinese: 通过连接黄色激光完成挑战。
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung ab, indem du einen gelben Laser verbindest.
description.french: Terminez le défi en connectant un laser jaune.

description.english: Complete the challenge in the dark.
description.portuguese: Completa o desafio no escuro.
description.brazilian: Complete o desafio no escuro.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío en la oscuridad.
description.japanese: 暗闇の中でチャレンジを完了してください。
description.schinese: 在黑暗中完成挑战。
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung im Dunkeln ab.
description.french: Terminez le défi dans l'obscurité.

description.english: Complete the challenge by connecting a multicolor laser.
description.indonesian: Selesaikan tantangan dengan menghubungkan laser multiwarna.
description.portuguese: Completa o desafio a ligar um laser multicolorido.
description.brazilian: Complete o desafio conectando um laser multicolorido.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío conectando un láser multicolor.
description.turkish: Çok renkli bir lazer bağlayarak mücadeleyi tamamlayın.
description.japanese: 多色レーザーを接続してチャレンジを完了してください。
description.schinese: 通过连接多色激光完成挑战。
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung ab, indem du einen mehrfarbigen Laser verbindest.
description.french: Terminez le défi en connectant un laser multicolore.

description.english: Complete the challenge by sliding across the ice.
description.indonesian: Selesaikan tantangan dengan meluncur di atas es.
description.portuguese: Completa o desafio a deslizar no gelo.
description.brazilian: Complete o desafio deslizando no gelo.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío deslizándote sobre el hielo.
description.polish: Ukończ wyzwanie, ślizgając się po lodzie.
description.japanese: 氷の上を滑ってチャレンジを完了してください。
description.schinese: 通过在冰上滑动完成挑战。
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung ab, indem du über das Eis gleitest.
description.french: Terminez le défi en glissant sur la glace.

displayName.japanese: 自動再生ソリューション

description.english: Use autoplay solution at least once.
description.indonesian: Gunakan solusi putar otomatis setidaknya sekali.
description.portuguese: Usa a solução de reprodução automática pelo menos uma vez.
description.brazilian: Use a solução de reprodução automática pelo menos uma vez.
description.spanish: Usa la solución de reproducción automática al menos una vez.
description.turkish: Otomatik oynatma çözümünü en az bir kez kullanın.
description.polish: Użyj rozwiązania automatycznej rozgrywki przynajmniej raz.
description.japanese: 自動再生ソリューションを少なくとも 1 回使用してください。
description.schinese: 至少使用一次自动播放解决方案。
description.koreana: 자동 재생 솔루션을 한 번 이상 사용하세요.
description.german: Verwende die Autoplay-Lösung mindestens einmal.
description.french: Utilisez la solution de lecture automatique au moins une fois.
description.russian: Используйте решение автовоспроизведения хотя бы один раз.
